channel.title: Exit Tunes Archives - VNN
channel.description: Everything about virtual voices, just one click away!

item.title: EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocalostream feat. Hatsune Miku Details!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
It’s time for a new fabulous compilation from EXIT TUNES! With this album, we celebrate their 10th anniversary of vocaloid compilations to be released and it includes various vocalist, from our beloved twintail diva Hatsune Miku to the little vflower! I’m very glad to introduce to you the “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocalostream feat. Hatsune Miku” album! …

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocalostream feat. Hatsune Miku Details! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s time for a new fabulous compilation from EXIT TUNES! With this album, we celebrate their 10th anniversary of vocaloid compilations to be released and it includes various vocalist, from our beloved twintail diva Hatsune Miku to the little vflower! I’m very glad to introduce to you the “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocalostream feat. Hatsune Miku” album!

About the compilation

So much time has passed since EXIT TUNES’s first compilation of this kind, and now, we are celebrating it with a whole new addition to the series! Let’s take a look at the cross-fade video and tracklist below together!

Tracklist

  1. Teo // Omoi feat. Hatsune Miku
  2. Alien Alien // Nayutalien feat. Hatsune Miku
  3. Charles // balloon feat. v flower
  4. HIBANA // DECO＊27, Rockwell feat. Hatsune Miku
  5. Law-evading Rock // Neru feat. Kagamine Len
  6. Rettou Joutou /BRING IT ON) // GigaP feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  7. Fixer // nulut feat. v flower
  8. If I Became Someone’s Heart // YurriCanon feat. GUMI
  9. DAYBREAK FRONTLINE // Orangestar feat. IA
  10. Aira // n-buna feat. GUMI
  11. Cendrillon 10th Anniversary // SignalP feat. KAITO, Hatsune Miku
  12. JUSTIN⇒JIVE⇒JUSTIFY // nyanyannya feat. Kamui Gakupo
  13. Alice in N.Y. // Hitoshizuku, yama△ feat. Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, GUMI, Kamui Gakupo, IA, MAYU    *New song
  14. 2018 // niki feat. Kagamine Rin   *New song
  15. A new song by Mafumafu
  16. A new song by JimmyThumbP
  17. A new song by 164
    etc…

Tracklist may be subject to changes

This compilation will be released on March 20th, if you pre-order this CD from Amazon JP, you will also get an additional disc with two exclusive remixes!

Disc 2 Tracklist

  1. Alien Alien (Kairiki bear Remix)
  2. Teo (DIVELA Remix)

Click here to Pre-Order the album from Amazon JP

Included in this compilation are legendary songs that guided us during our journey as fans in the past few years, it’s surely a wonderful opportunity for us to enjoy them once again, together with some new exclusive compositions that will give a new fresh breeze to the listeners.

Purchase Bonuses

By buying the album on any store, you will also get a standard set of merchandise! Those goods are very limited and will only be available until stocks ends, so be sure to get your album quickly!

Buying the album, will get you an Acrylic Keychain, a Can Badge (both of the keychain and Can Badge are picked up randomly) and a IC Card Sticker. However, those are only available in a limited amount and won’t be given to costumers once the stocks ends. Better be quick! As for the CD label and the sleeve case, those aren’t limited, so no worries!

Potune Limited Edition

Potune Online Shop also offers a limited edition of the album, which includes all of the merchandise we showed you in the paragraph above, plus two extra exclusive goods you will absolutely love!

You can buy Potune’s Limited Edition by clicking here! It is priced 4,254 JPY!

This store doesn’t ship overseas, so you may need to ask a friend or use a proxy service to get it

Bonus Pre-Order

Offering a bonus for pre-order costumers has become a tradition to this compilation series, especially for retailers, and of course, this one makes no exception, so let’s have a look on what they can offer us!

  1. Animate Online Shop: A clear file and a custom acrylic keychain of your choice (illustrated by LAM)

     

     


    You can choose between different characters: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, GUMI, Kamui Gakupo, IA, MAYU and vflower
    (Click on the name of the character you are interested to choose and it will bring you to its product page!)

  2. Bunkyodo Hobby: A clear file (illustrated by Tama)

    Click here to buy the album from Bunkyodo Hobby

  3. Tower Records: A 100mm badge (illustrated by LAM)

    Click here to buy the album from Tower Records

  4. Tsutaya Records: An alternative jacket cover (illustrated by Tama)

    Click here to buy the album from Tsutaya Records

  5. Toranoana: A custom bromide print (illustrated by LAM)

    Click here to buy the album from Toranoana

All of the bonus pre-orders are limited and bound to not have a huge stock of them, so if you are interested in them, it’s best you order your album as fast as you can!

HMV & BOOKS Store

You can also buy the album from HMV by clicking here! This store doesn’t offer any exclusive merchandise with it, however the shop is fully in English so it might be a bit more easier to buy from there!

Conclusions

If you are a fan of huge compilations including many vocalist on it, EXIT TUNES’s series is just what you are looking for! This marvelous mix of music and genres is perfect for anyone’s taste and mood! Feel free to tell us what you think about it in the comment section below!

Stay tuned with us on VNN for all the news and updates about your favorite Virtual Singers!

Vocalosteam Offivial Website
EXIT TUNES ACADEMY on Twitter

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocalostream feat. Hatsune Miku Details! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~ Now Available for Pre-order
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
With the weather warming up outside, it’s probably the perfect time to learn about the next installment of the seasonal VOCALOID album series, EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~! The new compilation album is set for release on April 4th, 2018, and pre-orders are now open! 【4/4発売!】“季節”テーマにしたボカロコンピ「Vocaloseasons」第三弾の季節は“春”予約を開始しました！特典充実の限定セットもございますので是非ご予約ください!!　詳細は⇒　https://t.co/eUloRmdWlh pic.twitter.com/X9rt7LtvCV — EXIT TUNES ACADEMY (@etajp) January 19, 2018 …

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~ Now Available for Pre-order appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
With the weather warming up outside, it’s probably the perfect time to learn about the next installment of the seasonal VOCALOID album series, EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~! The new compilation album is set for release on April 4th, 2018, and pre-orders are now open!

【4/4発売!】“季節”テーマにしたボカロコンピ「Vocaloseasons」第三弾の季節は“春”予約を開始しました！特典充実の限定セットもございますので是非ご予約ください!!　詳細は⇒　https://t.co/eUloRmdWlh pic.twitter.com/X9rt7LtvCV

— EXIT TUNES ACADEMY (@etajp) January 19, 2018

“【4/4 Release!】Pre-orders have begun for the 3rd installment of the season-themed ‘Vocaloseaons’ compilation album series, “Spring!” The limited-time complete goods set is also available, so pre-order it while you still can!! Details here ⇒ vocaloseasons.com“

The album will compile over 13 classic and original VOCALOID songs from a wide variety of producers to welcome the coming of spring. You can watch the crossfade for the album below on Youtube.

If the video is unavailable in your country, then you can watch it on Niconico here.

Track List (subject to change)

Here are the songs that have been announced for the album so far. Please be aware that this list is still subject to change, as EXIT TUNES will likely announce more songs for the album soon. All translated song titles are unofficial.

  1. 桜前線異常ナシ (Sakurazensen Ijou Nashi, “Nothing Odd On the Cherry Blossom Front”) by ワタルP (wataruP) feat. Hatsune Miku
  2. 桜ノ雨 (Sakura no Ame, “Cherry Blossom Rain”) by halyosy feat. Hatsune Miku
  3. 桜の季節 (Sakura no Kisetsu, “Season of Cherry Blossoms”) by ゆうゆ (Yuuyu) feat. Hatsune Miku
  4. センチメンタルな愛慕心 (Sentimental na Aiboshin “Heart of Sentimental Love”) by なつめ千秋 (Chiaki Natsume) feat. GUMI
  5. 過ぎし3月の君へ (Sugishi Sangatsu no Kimi e, “To You From This Past March”) by doriko feat. Hatsune Miku
  6. 東京バレエ (Tokyo Ballet) by クロワッサンシカゴ (Croissant Chicago) feat. Hatsune Miku
  7. にじいろのはる (Nijiiro no Haru, “Rainbow Colored Spring”) by ふわりP (FuwariP) feat. Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, GUMI, Camui Gackpo, IA, MAYU
  8. ハジマリノヒ (Hajimari no Hi “The First Day”) by 彩音 (～xi-on～) feat. Hatsune Miku
  9. 春に一番近い街 (Haru ni Ichiban Chikai Machi, “The Town Nearest to Spring”) by 40mP feat. GUMI
  10. 『紅桜』少女幻奏 ([Benizakura] Shoujo Gensou, “[Red Cherry Blossoms] A Girl’s  Illusion Performance”) by mint* feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  11. An original song by はりーP (HarryP)
  12. An original song by 有機酸 (Yuukisan)
  13. An original song by YM

Special Merchandise

All purchases of EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~ will come with one out of three possible acrylic keychains (determined at random) featuring illustrations of Hatsune Miku by 賀茂川 (Kamogawa), はあと (Haato)), or △□○× (Miwasiba), as well as a 515 x 515 mm (about 20 x 20 in) square poster, while supplies last.

As always, with each Vocaloseasons album comes a unique registration ticket. If you manage to purchase all four albums when they are released, and submit each of their tickets along with the survey card that comes with the final album, Vocaloseasons ~Summer~, then you will receive a special CD featuring two original songs from 1640P, the duo made up of 164 and 40mP!

Track list:

  1. Hatsune
    Lyrics: 164          Music: 40mP          Arrangement: 1640mP
  2. [Song Title TBA]
    Lyrics: 40mp          Music: 164          Arrangement: 1640mP

Where to Pre-order

You can pre-order the EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~ album from various online stores, many of which offering their own additional bonus items when you pre-order with them. See below for a summary of all the different pre-order pages and their available bonus items.

Animate

A4-sized clear file folder of the album jacket illustration, OR a wallpaper set for desktop or mobile devices

Price: ￥2,808 JPY (about $25 USD)

Pre-order on Animate here.

Animega

Alternate CD jacket (A)

[Price and pre-order link coming soon]

Amazon

A 54mm (about 2 in) can badge

Price: ￥2,808 JPY (about $25 USD)

Pre-order on Amazon here.

Tower Records

A special sticker set

Price: ￥2,808 JPY (about $25 USD)

Pre-order on Tower Records here.

Tsutaya Records

A set of 3 bookmarks

Price: ￥2,808 JPY (about $25 USD)

Pre-order on Tsutaya Records here.

Toranoana

Alternat CD jacket (B)

[Price and pre-order link coming soon]

Neowing

A set of CD jacket-sized stickers

[Price and pre-order link coming soon]

Potune

Complete goods set:

  1. One random acrylic keychain
  2. One 150mm (about 6 in) tall acrylic figure stand
  3. One IC card with the jacket illustration
  4. One set of 3 postcards

Price: ￥4,298 JPY (about $39 USD)

Pre-order on Potune here.

CD Japan

No bonus.

Price: $23.47 USD

Pre-order on CD Japan here.

As more information on the track list and pre-order sites are revealed, VNN will report with updates.

Information Source

EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons Portal Site

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Spring~ Now Available for Pre-order appeared first on VNN.

item.title: EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Winter~ Now Available for Pre-order!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
For fans who remember our previous article about EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Autumn~, the next installment in the album series has been announced. EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons feat. Hatsune Miku ~Winter~ is set for release on January 17th, 2018! The album contains 14 winter-themed songs, and features a wide variety of producers and VOCALOIDs. Read …

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Winter~ Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For fans who remember our previous article about EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Autumn~, the next installment in the album series has been announced. EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons feat. Hatsune Miku ~Winter~ is set for release on January 17th, 2018!

The album contains 14 winter-themed songs, and features a wide variety of producers and VOCALOIDs. Read on to find out the full details!

【Vocaloseasons第二弾予約開始！】季節をテーマにしたボカロコンピの第二弾～Winter～の予約がいよいよ開始されました！冬にぴったいなボカロ名曲を聴いて冬を満喫してださい！また、限定セットも是非ご予約を！　https://t.co/eUloRmdWlh pic.twitter.com/JNnWbKehFM

— EXIT TUNES ACADEMY (@etajp) November 17, 2017

“Pre-orders for the second installment in the season-themed VOCALOID compilation album series, ~Winter~, are now open! Get your fill of winter by listening to these VOCALOID songs that are perfect for the season! Be sure to pre-order the limited edition set, too! http://vocaloseasons.com&/#8221;

You can watch the crossfade for the album below on Youtube.

If the video is unavailable in your country, then you can watch it on Niconico here.

Track List (subject to change)

  1. オリオンの夢 (Orion no Yume) by buzzG feat. GUMI
  2. 鈍色空に花吹雪 (Nibiiro Sora ni Hanafubuki) by 仕事してP (ShigotoshiteP) feat. KAITO
  3. soundless voice by ひとしずくP (HitoshizukuP) feat. Kagamine Len
  4. ショパンと氷の白鍵 (Chopin to Kouri no Hakken) by まふまふ (Mafumafu) feat. Hatsune Miku
  5. 白い雪のプリンセスは (Shiroi Yuki no Princess wa) by のぼる↑ (noboru↑) feat. Hatsune Miku
  6. スターナイトスノウ (Star Night Snow) by Orangestar and ナブナ (nabuna) feat. Hatsune Miku
  7. Snow Song Show by sasakure.UK and Deco*27 feat. Hatsune Miku
  8. スノートリック (Snow Trick) by すこっぷ (scop) feat. Hatsune Miku
  9. 東京駅 (Tokyo Eki) by みきとP (MikitoP) feat. Kagamine Rin
  10. drop of regret <2017-18 winter mix> by のりぴー (NoriP) feat. Megurine Luka
  11. ライカ (Leica) by yamada feat. Hatsune Miku
  12. Original song by こんにちは谷田さん (Konnichiwa Tanita-san)
  13. Original song by ぬゆり (nulut)
  14. Original song by ふわりP (FuwariP)

Special Merchandise

All purchases of EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Winter~ will come with one out of a possible three acrylic keychains (determined at random) featuring illustrations by 賀茂川 (Kamogawa), まご (Mago), and wogura, as well as a set of 515 x 515 mm (about 20 x 20 in) square posters, while supplies last.

Furthermore, each of the Vocaloseasons albums will come with a unique registration ticket. If you manage to purchase all four albums when they are released, and submit each of their tickets along with the survey that comes with the final album, Vocaloseasons ~Summer~, then you will receive a special CD featuring two original songs from 164 and 40mP (otherwise known as the 1640mP duo)!

Where to Pre-order

You can pre-order the EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Winter~ from various stores, including Animate,  Amazon, and many more!

Depending on where you pre-order the album from, you can get additional bonus items or alternate CD jackets.

We have provided a summary of the different versions available below, with links to the sites where you can pre-order them now.

Animate:

Animate has two options available as bonuses for pre-ordering the album: one which comes with an A4 clear file folder, or one which comes with a set of wallpapers for desktop and mobile.

Price: ¥ 2,808 (Approx. 25 USD)

Pre-oder on Animate

Animega:

At Animega, you can pre-order the album with an alternate CD Jacket A.

Price: ¥2,808 (Approx. 25 USD)

Pre-order on Animega

Amazon:

Amazon is offering a 54mm can badge as a bonus item with each pre-order of the album.

Price: ¥ 2,808 (Approx. 25 USD)

Pre-order on Amazon

Tower Records:

Tower Records’ bonus item is a cute sticker which comes with each pre-order of the album.

Price: ¥ 2,808 (Approx. 25 USD)

Pre-order on Tower Records

Tsutaya Records:

From Tsutaya Records, you can get a 3-piece bookmark set as a bonus item when you pre-order the album.

Price: ¥ 2,808 (Approx. 25 USD)

Pre-order on Tsutaya Records

Toranoana:

At Toranoana, you can get another alternate CD jacket for the album, CD Jacket B.

Price: ¥ 2,600 + Tax (Approx. 23 USD)

Pre-order on Toranoana

NEOWING:

NEOWING is offering a CD jacket-sized sticker with each pre-order of the album from their website.

Price: ¥ 2,600 + Tax (Approx. 23 USD)

Pre-order on NEOWING

Potune:

Last but not least, Potune is offering a special goods set with the EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Winter~ album, which contains the following:

  1. Random acrylic keychain
  2. CD jacket illustration
  3. IC card sticker of the jacket illustration
  4. 3-piece postcard set

*Items included in the special goods set are subject to change
*Special goods set is available on a while-supplies-last basis
*Special goods set is not for resale

Price: ¥ 4,298 (Approx. 38 USD)

Pre-order on Potune

CD Japan

No bonus

Price: ¥ 2,600 ($23.39 USD)

Pre-order on CD Japan

Information Source

Vocaloseasons website
VocaDB

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Vocaloseasons ~Winter~ Now Available for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Pair of Kagamine 10th Anniversary Albums Coming this December!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
As 2017 winds down and the thrill from Hatsune Miku‘s 10th anniversary begins to wane (or not), VOCALOID fans can start drumming up excitement for another pair of 10th anniversaries coming next month: those of Kagamine Len and Kagamine Rin! This VOCALOID pair was first released on December 27th, 2007, and both EXIT TUNES and …

The post Pair of Kagamine 10th Anniversary Albums Coming this December! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
As 2017 winds down and the thrill from Hatsune Miku‘s 10th anniversary begins to wane (or not), VOCALOID fans can start drumming up excitement for another pair of 10th anniversaries coming next month: those of Kagamine Len and Kagamine Rin! This VOCALOID pair was first released on December 27th, 2007, and both EXIT TUNES and KarenT are putting together their own albums and accompanying goods to celebrate the big day!

EXIT TUNES PRESENTS The Kagaminext -10th Anniversary Best-

【鏡音リン、レン10周年記念アルバム発売決定！】12/20に鏡音リン、レン誕生10周年アルバム「Kagaminext feat.鏡音リン、鏡音レン」の発売が決定！豪華特典盤も要チェック⇒　https://t.co/fjrFjIVuFo pic.twitter.com/ws141aG6fZ

— EXIT TUNES ACADEMY (@etajp) October 18, 2017

Announcing the Kagamine Rin and Len 10th anniversary commemorative album, on sale 12/20! Check here for details on the special goods edition ⇒ http://kagaminext.extsm.com/

From EXIT TUNES comes “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Kagaminext  -10th Anniversary Best-,” compiling no less than 29 different hit songs with Kagamine Rin and Kagamine Len from the past decade! Check out the trailer!

If the YouTube video is unavailable in your country, you can watch on Niconico here.

https://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm32117013

Track List (subject to change)

  1. イカサマ⇔カジノ (Ikasama ⇔ Casino) / HitoshizukuP × Yama△ feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  2. 右肩の蝶 (Migikata no Chou, “Butterfly on the Right Shoulder”) / NoriP feat. Kagamine Len
  3. 深海シティアンダーグラウンド (Shinkai City Underground) / tanakaB feat. Kagamine Rin
  4. Paradichlorobenzene / Garuna (OwataP) feat. Kagamine Len
  5. 天樂 (Tengaku) / Yuuyu feat. Kagamine Rin
  6. 悪ノ召使 (Aku no Meshitsukai, “Servant of Evil”) / mothy_AkunoP feat. Kagamine Len
  7. ジェミニ (Gemini) / Dixie Flatline feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  8. 鏡音レンの暴走 (Kagamine Len no Bousou) / cosMo@BusouP feat. Kagamine Len
  9. いろは唄 (Iroha Uta) / Ginsaku feat. Kagamine Rin
  10. リンリンシグナル (Rin Rin Signal) / DIOS / SignalP feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  11. 炉心融解 (Roshin Yuukai, “Meltdown”) / iroha (sasaki) feat. Kagamine Rin
  12. よっこらせっくす (Yokkorasex) / Agoaniki feat. Kagamine Rin
  13. しんでしまうとはなさけない！ (Shinde Shimau to wa Nasakenai!) / JesusP (Wonderful☆Opportunity!) Feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  14. 誰でもいいから付き合いたい (Daredemo ii kara Tsukiaitai) / Takkyuu Shounen feat. Kagamine Len
  15. メランコリック (Melancholic) / Junky feat. Kagamine Rin
  16. 厨病激発ボーイ (Chuubyou Gekihatsu Boy) / rerulili feat. Kagamine Len
  17. 聖槍爆裂ボーイ (Seisou Bakuretsu Boy) / rerulili x Moja (Hiroki Ooshiba) feat. Kagamine Len
  18. ハウトゥー世界征服 (How-to Sekai Seifuku) / Neru feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  19. ロストワンの号哭 (Lost One no Goukoku) / Neru feat. Kagamine Rin
  20. エンプレス＝ディスコ (Empress = Disco) / nyanyannya feat. Kagamine Rin
  21. レッド・パージ！！！ (Red Purge!!!) / P.I.N.A. feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  22. 脱獄 (Datsugoku) / Neru feat. Kagamine Rin
  23. スキキライ (Suki Kirai) / HoneyWorks feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  24. Original song by iroha (sasaki)
  25. Original song by Garuna (OwataP)
  26. Original song by JesusP (Wonderful☆オOpportunity!)
  27. Original song by DIOS / SignalP
  28. Original song by Hitoshizuku x Yama△
  29. ＜Bonus Track＞ 蜜月アン・ドゥ・トロワ (Mitsugetsu Un Deux Trois) / DATEKEN feat. Asami Shimoda

Featuring Artwork by:

ぶーた (Booota) (CD jacket)
△〇□× (miwashiba) (merchandise illustration)
Yおじ (Y Oji) (merchandise illustration)

Special Merchandise

All purchases of EXIT TUNES PRESENT Kagaminext will come with one out of a possible four keychains (determined at random) featuring illustrations by △〇□× (miwashiba) and Yおじ (Y Oji), as well as a special SONOCA card while supplies last. The audio file that the SONOCA card will enable you to download and listen to, is a recorded story entitled “第一幕 祝☆10周年誕生祭、開催！～クリスマスの夜～ (Act 1: Celebrate☆10th Anniversary Birthday Fest! ~A Christmas Night~)” by HitoshizukuP.

Furthermore, each site that is taking pre-orders is also offering up its own set of bonus goods (also while supplies last)! Peruse below, and choose wisely!

Canime:

  1. Acrylic keychain (4 kinds, chosen at random), featuring the illustrations of △〇□× (miwashiba) and Yおじ (Y Oji)
  2. Acrylic stand set, featuring the CD jacket illustration by ぶーた (Boota)
  3. Artbook compiling illustrations by グライダー (Glider), 三月八日 (Sanpachi), 456, 鈴ノ助 (Suzunosuke), たま (Tama), 田村ヒロ (Hiro Tamura), Nidy-2D-, にわ子 (Niwako), NEGI, はあと (Haato), 119, 猫魚 (Nekosakana), のう (Nou), and MACCO
  4. 3-piece can badge set, featuring illustrations by 雪乃たまご (Yukino Tamago)
  5. B2 poster featuring the CD jacket illustration

Price: ￥5,000 JPY (about $44 USD)

Pre-order on Canime here!

Animate:

  • A4 clear file folder, featuring illustrations by 456

Price: ￥3,456 JPY (about $31 USD)

Pre-order on Animate here!

Animate Online:

  • Wallpaper set

Price: ￥3,456 JPY (about $31 USD)

Pre-order on Animate Online here!

Animega Bunkyodo:

  • A3 Poster

Price: ￥3,456 JPY (about $31 USD)

Pre-order on Animega Bunkyodo here!

Amazon:

  • A4 clear file folder

Price: ￥3,456 JPY (about $31 USD)

Pre-order on Amazon here!

Gamers:

  • Bromide portrait

Price: ￥3,200 JPY (about $28 USD) plus tax

Pre-order on Gamers here!

Tower Records:

  • Postcard set, featuring illustrations by 田村ヒロ (Hiro Tamura), はあと (Haato), and 猫魚 (Nekosakana)

Price: ￥3,456 JPY (about $31 USD)

Pre-order on Tower Records here!

Tsutaya Records:

  • Alternate CD jacket illustration by NEGI

Price: ￥3,456 JPY (about $31 USD)

Pre-order on Tsutaya Records here!

Toranoana:

  • Can badge

Pre-order on Toranoana here!

CD Japan:

  • No bonus

Pre-order on CD Japan here!

KARENT Presents Kagamine Rin and Len 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR-

But that’s not all! Set for release right on the Kagamines’ 10th anniversary on December 27th, 2017, is KARENT’s 20-song album entitled “KARENT Present Kagamine Rin and Len 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR-!”

 

12/27発売「KARENT presents 鏡音リン・レン 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR-」書き下ろし新曲や封入特典情報UPiXimaさんが手掛けたとってもキュートなジャケットイラストも本日初公開? https://t.co/ykhkuvPN2z pic.twitter.com/2rrW2AVYcD

— KARENT (@KarenT_Crypton) October 27, 2017

Info on the original songs and special goods for “KARENT Presents Kagamine Rin and Len 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR-,” set for release on 12/27, is now up We’re also revealing the jacket illustration by iXima? http://karent.jp/cd/rl10th

鏡音リン・レン 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR- | KARENT https://t.co/V3rFYCTzHv　リンレン10周年記念アルバムのジャケット描いております！サイトではイラスト見にくいですがカイメイからのシリーズでこんな感じ。お気に入りです。 pic.twitter.com/pLRLAK6sXI

— iXima/冬コミ金東A87a (@iximaxima) October 27, 2017

I provided the jacket illustration for the Rin-Len 10th anniversary album from KARENT http://karent.jp/cd/rl10th! It’s a bit hard to get a good image of it on the official site, but it continues the style from the KAI–MEI series. I really enjoyed drawing it.

【告知】鏡音公式10周年CDの特典SONOCAに、KARENT楽曲による鏡音曲ノンストップメドレーを提供させて頂くことになりました！よろしくお願いします！！

鏡音リン・レン 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR-https://t.co/bB1RC1hjDH

— アンメルツP@RLM10／調声参加「恋文綴凛」 (@gcmstyle) October 27, 2017

I was given the honor of providing the non-stop medley of Kagamine songs for the SONOCA card included with the official Kagamine 10th anniversary CD by KARENT! I hope you like it!

Tracklist (subject to change)

  1. Original song by Junky
  2. Original song by Karasu Yosabou
  3. Original song by KulfiQ
  4. Original song by Travolta
  5. Original song by Takeaki Wada (KurageP)
  6. Original song by note@L-tone
  7. リモコン (Remote Control) -V4X ver.- / JesusP (Wonderful☆Opportunity!） feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  8. Fire◎Flower / halyosy feat. Kagamine Len
  9. ココロ (Kokoro) / Travolta feat. Kagamine Rin
  10. Q / siinamota (PowapowaP) feat. Kagamine Rin
  11. FPS / Neru feat. Kagamine Len
  12. 紡唄 -つむぎうた- (Tsumugi Uta) / DATEKEN feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  13. 強烈な色 (Kyouretsu na Iro) / LiveP feat. Kagamine Rin
  14. 猫にオレンジ (Neko ni Orange) / Lunachu feat. Kagamine Rin
  15. 夢喰い白黒バク (Yumekui Shirokuro Baku) / Nem feat. Kagamine Len
  16. 芥の部屋は錆色に沈む (Gomi no Heya wa Sabiiro ni Shizumu) / Konnichiwa Tanita-san feat. Kagamine Rin
  17. 馬鹿はアノマリーに憧れる (Baka wa Anomaly ni Akogareru) / UtsuP feat. Kagamine Rin
  18. メインキャラクター (Main Character) / *Luna feat. Kagamine Len
  19. chocolate box / dezzy (IchiokuenP) feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  20. Bonus Track / (coming soon)

Special Merchandise

-LODESTAR- will also come with its own SONOCA card that will enable you to download a non-stop medley of Rin and Len songs entitled “RINLENMANIA of KARENT LINEUP,” created by Ann-MeltsP. You can learn more about the medley on its official site here, and start listening to it on Niconico here!

Also included on the SONOCA card is the download for a track entitled “第二幕　祝☆10周年誕生祭、開催！〜前夜祭〜 (Act 2: Celebrate☆10th Anniversary Birthday Fest! ~Last Night’s Fest~),” also created by HitoshizukuP as a follow-up to the story from Kagaminext’s SONOCA card.

Finally, ordering at each of the following online stores will net you an exclusive can badge, which differ depending on the store! All illustrations used for the badges were provided by 森 (Mori).

“Kagamine Rin and Len 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR-” costs ￥2,800 JPY (about $25 USD).

Also available on CD Japan.

Information Source

EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Kagaminext Official Website
Kagamine Rin Len 10th Anniversary -LODESTAR- Official Website

The post Pair of Kagamine 10th Anniversary Albums Coming this December! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: EXIT TUNES PRESENTS: Vocaloseasons Autumn Announced
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Exit Tunes is back at it with another VOCALOID compilation album. This time, it’s part one of a four album series based on the seasons. The first album, EXIT TUNES PRESENTS: Vocaloseasons, is set for an October 4th release. While Miku is the title and featured singer, the album itself has a ton of different …

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS: Vocaloseasons Autumn Announced appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Exit Tunes is back at it with another VOCALOID compilation album. This time, it’s part one of a four album series based on the seasons. The first album, EXIT TUNES PRESENTS: Vocaloseasons, is set for an October 4th release. While Miku is the title and featured singer, the album itself has a ton of different VOCALOIDs on it to fit everyone’s fancy. The other albums will release in Winter 2017, Spring 2018, and Summer 2018.

Crossfade

For those facing country restrictions, the video is also available on NND here.

Track List

While the whole track list hasn’t been revealed, there are more than twelve songs to look forward to on this album!

  1. Otsukimi Recital by Jin feat. IA
  2. Orange by Tohma feat. Hatsune Miku Append (Sweet)
  3. Karakuri Pierrot by 40mP feat. Hatsune Miku
  4. Kimi no Suki na Hon by NishizawasanP feat. GUMI
  5. Red Leaf by KurousaP feat. Megurine Luka
  6. Crescent Moon by KurousaP feat. KAITO V3 (Soft)
  7. Tsugai Kogarashi by ShigotoshiteP feat. KAITO, MEIKO
  8. Tsukimiyo Rabbit by ChouchouP feat. Hatsune Miku
  9. Dreamless Dreams by Harumaki Gohan feat. Hatsune Miku
  10. trick and treat by OSTER project feat. Kagamine Rin, Kagamine Len
  11. “Nee.” by HoehoeP feat. Hatsune Miku
  12. Happy Halloween by Junky feat. Kagamine Rinand more!

Pre-order Bonuses

Lots of stores have different pre-order bonuses. While not all of them ship internationally, there’s a ton to choose from. In addition, everyone who pre-orders also receives a special acrylic key chain! The illustrations featured in the bonuses are by Saine, Chachagoma, and Kamogawa.

The price of the regular version of the album is ¥2,600 JPY (about $23.50 USD)

Acrylic Key Chains

There are three different acrylic key chains, one by each featured artist. Like other Exit Tunes compilation albums, the key chain you’ll receive with this one is random as well. However, all three are so cute it’s a win no matter what!

Square Poster

This limited 515 x 515mm square poster featuring the illustration from Kamogawa comes straight from the manufacturer as a bonus. The quantity isn’t mentioned, however. Fans who pre-order quickly are the most likely to receive it. However, it appears all of the limited edition versions (explained in more detail later in the article) come with the poster.

Animate (In-Store)

A4 Clear File illustrated by Kamogawa

Animate Online

Original Wallpaper Set featuring all the illustrators

Purchase from Animate

Animega

An alternative CD jacket illustrated by Kamogawa

Tower Records

Original Sticker illustrated by Saine

Purchase from Tower Records

Tsutaya Records

3pcs Bookmark Set featuring all the illustrators

Purchase from Tsutaya Records

Toranoana

 

Another Jacket illustrated by Chacha Goma

Purchase from Toroana

Neowing

Jacket Size Sticker illustrated by Saine

Purchase from Neowing

CDJapan

Sticker illustrated by Saine

Purchase from CDJapan

 

Special Limited Version

In addition to the regular version, there’s a special limited version available as well for ¥3,980 JPY on the Exit Tunes online shop. Those wishing to purchase the limited version internationally can do so through CDJapan for ¥4,298 JPY ($38.68 USD).

1) One of the three acrylic key chains (random)
2) Acrylic smartphone stand (170 × 135 mm size) featuring the jacket illustration
3) IC card sticker featuring the jacket illustration
4) Set of three postcards: each one featuring one of the three illustrations

Also includes: 515 x 515mm square poster featuring the illustration by Kamogawa.

Purchase from the Exit Tunes Online Shop

Purchase from CDJapan

Other Bonus!

For fans who are a ready to buy all four of the albums, there’s a special bonus in it for you as well! We’re unsure if it applies to international fans, however. Each Vocaloseasons album will come with a unique registration ticket. The final album of the four part series, “Summer”, will come with a survey. People who have purchased all four albums can then submit that with all four of the registration tickets to register to receive the special CD.

The CD in question features two songs written by 164 and 40mP!

Where to Buy

Once again, here are the purchase links for fans. Please note that unless stated to ship internationally, the website likely doesn’t. And, of course, those outside of Japan can’t receive in-store bonuses without a proxy.

Regular Version

Animate Online

Tower Records

Purchase from Tsutaya Records

Toroana

Neowing

Known International Sellers (Regular Version)

CDJapan

Purchase from Amazon Japan

Special Limited Version

Exit Tunes Online Shop (Japan Only)

CDJapan (International Proxy)

—————–

Source: vocaloseasons.com

The post EXIT TUNES PRESENTS: Vocaloseasons Autumn Announced appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “MAYU’s Mystery-solving Challenge ~Take Back the Magical Melody!~” Event Announced!
item.dc:creator: marumain
item.description:
We may not see MAYU in the news that often, but this weekend, she’ll be coming into the limelight in a big way: challenging her fans to some good old-fashioned mystery-solving! From Saturday, July 15th through Monday, July 17th, an event entitled MAYU’s Mystery-Solving Challenge ~Take Back the Magical Melody!~ will be taking place at the …

The post “MAYU’s Mystery-solving Challenge ~Take Back the Magical Melody!~” Event Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
We may not see MAYU in the news that often, but this weekend, she’ll be coming into the limelight in a big way: challenging her fans to some good old-fashioned mystery-solving!

From Saturday, July 15th through Monday, July 17th, an event entitled MAYU’s Mystery-Solving Challenge ~Take Back the Magical Melody!~ will be taking place at the AEON Mall in Nogata. The event is being sponsored by EXIT TUNES and Nazotomo, organizers of real-life interactive game events.

ブログ更新したよー('v'*)♪ #MAYU #EXIT_TUNES #謎解きイベント 謎解きイベントおしらせだよ～！！ https://t.co/FZQsvntjKQ

— MAYUです (@MAYU_ET) July 7, 2017

“I updated my blog! (‘v’*)♪ #MAYU #EXIT_TUNES #謎解きイベント Read all about my new mystery-solving event~!! https://lineblog.me/mayu_vocaloid/archives/8344655.html“

【なぞとも新着】EXIT TUNESが誇るヤンデレ系ボーカロイド"MAYU"が謎解きゲームになって登場!!謎を解いて、魔法のメロディを取り戻すことはできるのか?!＞MAYUからのナゾトキ挑戦状 https://t.co/eo7xFmH1ZQ pic.twitter.com/OF5khSj5u1

— なぞとも＠謎解きイベント情報サイト (@nazotomo) July 10, 2017

“EXIT TUNES’ beloved yandere VOCALOID, MAYU, is debuting in a mystery game!! Can you solve this mystery and find the stolen Magical Melody!? > MAYU’s Mystery-Solving Challenge http://nazotomo.com/event/201707/2753.php#.WWROcumQw2w“

Event Details

Description: Mall-spanning mystery-solving game

Venue: AEON Mall in Nogata, Fukuoka Prefecture. Register at the 1F Tulip Court

Dates & Time: Saturday, July 15th ~ Monday, July 17th, 11:00 AM ~ 8:00 PM

Participant Limit: 500 persons per day

Entry Fee: ¥200 JPY (about $2 USD) for general admission, ¥100 JPY (about $1 USD) for followers of AEON Mall Nogata’s LINE account

Organizers: Nazotoki Adventure, EXIT TUNES, & Asahi Advertising Inc.

Additional Support: CROSS FM

Event Description

“Today, there will be a special presentation held to introduce the ‘Magical Melody,’ enjoyed by people all over the world. Everyone is waiting eagerly for the presentation to begin. However, there’s something odd in the air…

Then, breaking up the calm atmosphere, a loud and deafening announcement suddenly blares throughout the mall:

‘I, MAYU, HAVE TAKEN YOUR PRECIOUS “MAGICAL MELODY” FOR MYSELF! IF YOU WANT IT BACK, THEN YOU’LL HAVE TO SOLVE THE MYSTERY THAT I’VE LAID OUT BEFORE YOU! I WONDER IF ANY OF YOU HAS WHAT IT TAKES!'”
— From the Nazotomo event page

Do you think you can solve MAYU’s mystery and reclaim the “Magical Melody?” You can find out by heading to the AEON Mall in Nogata this weekend!

Info Sources

MAYU’s Official Blog
MAYU’s Official Twitter
Nazotomo’s Event Page
AEON Mall in Nogata’s Event Page
Weekly Vocafro

The post “MAYU’s Mystery-solving Challenge ~Take Back the Magical Melody!~” Event Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Meikonic” Pre-orders Open
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
While KAITO fans received Kaitonation last year, MEIKO fans were left in the dust. But now, it’s finally MEIKO’s time to shine with “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Meikonic!” Promotional Video For those dealing with YouTube Red, the video is also available on niconico. Track List The track list is subject to change, but these are the announced …

The post “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Meikonic” Pre-orders Open appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
While KAITO fans received Kaitonation last year, MEIKO fans were left in the dust. But now, it’s finally MEIKO’s time to shine with “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Meikonic!”

Promotional Video

For those dealing with YouTube Red, the video is also available on niconico.

Track List

The track list is subject to change, but these are the announced songs.

  • Nostalogic (New Arrange) by yuukiss
  • ピアノ×フォルテ×スキャンダル by OSTER project
  • 黄泉桜 by 仕事してP
  • PASSIONAIRE by yanagiP
  • 壊セ壊セ by ユーキ (E.L.V.N)
  • 夕闇ノ殺メ唄 by キラ星ひかる
  • Change me by shu-t
  • それが僕らのJustice! (Cubase Remix) by シンP
  • INTERMISSION by yanagiP
  • サムライソウル by チームカミウタ
  • Double Mē ～私が二人いたら～ by 斜め上P with IGASIO feat. Sakine Meiko (MEIKO)
  • サッドソング by パレットP
  • フロイライン＝ビブリォチカ by nyanyannya
  • 逆襲のMeiko by BingoBongoP
  • KURENAI BEAT (New Arrange) by yuukiss
  • A new song by yuukiss

Bonus Track

  • An untitled song by Meiko Haigou

Pre-order Bonuses

Lots of stores have pre-order bonuses if you order from them. With all these different options, MEIKO fans have quite a decision to make! However, there’s one bonus that everyone will get.

Phone Straps

There are three chibi-style rubber phone straps up for grabs. Each purchase comes with a random phone strap. The different strap designs are based on illustrations drawn by 秋吉 (Akiyoshi), あんこ (Anko), and 由杞 (Yoshiki).

EXIT TUNES Shop

Random strap mentioned above.
MEIKO illustration collection featuring 優 (Yuu), 秋吉 (Akiyoshi), あんこ (Anko), カラコロ (Carakoro), 栗栖 歳 (Kurisu Toshi), 由杞 (Yoshiki), and うむ (Um).
Can badge set (size 3.3 cm × 3 pieces) featuring the strap illustrations.
Illustration postcard set (3 sheets) featuring 優 (Yuu), あんこ (Anko), and 由杞 (Yoshiki).

Animate

CD jacket-sized sticker and an alternate CD jacket, both drawn by 優 (Yuu).
You can purchase from Animate here. Unfortunately, the album isn’t currently available on Animate International.

BUNKYODO HOBBY & Animega

An A3-sized poster drawn by 優 (Yuu).
You can purchase from BUNKYODO HOBBY and Animega here.

Amazon

Clear file folders drawn by 優 (Yuu).
You can pre-order from Amazon Japan here.

TSUTAYA ONLINE

Smartphone wallpapers drawn by 優 (Yuu).
You can order from TSUTAYA ONLINE here.

Tora no Ana

B2-sized poster drawn by 優 (Yuu).
You can pre-order from Tora no Ana here.

Neowing

Chibi MEIKO stickers drawn by 秋吉 (Akiyoshi), あんこ (Anko), and 由杞 (Yoshiki).
You can pre-order from Neowing here.

Also available for pre-order through Tower Records here.

International Pre-orders

While we can’t say for sure if all of the above sources ship internationally, we do know that the following websites ship around the world.

CDJapan ($22.55 USD)

Amazon Japan ($22.55 USD)

More Information

For more information, check out the official website (in Japanese)!

The post “EXIT TUNES PRESENTS Meikonic” Pre-orders Open appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “Exit Tunes Presents Kaitonation” Set for December Release!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
The new KAITO album Exit Tunes Presents Kaitonation is set to release on December 7th, 2016. The album contains 18 songs and a bonus track, of which four are brand new tracks while the 18th track is also a never-released bonus track featuring Naoto Fuuga. Promotional Video The promotional video for the album features the new …

The post “Exit Tunes Presents Kaitonation” Set for December Release! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The new KAITO album Exit Tunes Presents Kaitonation is set to release on December 7th, 2016. The album contains 18 songs and a bonus track, of which four are brand new tracks while the 18th track is also a never-released bonus track featuring Naoto Fuuga.

Promotional Video

The promotional video for the album features the new song “Kaitonation” by yuukiss with illustrations by 憂 (Yuu).

Track List

At the moment, the track list isn’t finalized so the order of the songs is subject to change. There are also untitled songs with only their producers announced. However, this is what the website currently provides as the included tracks:

  1. Kaitonation by yuukiss (Opening Theme / New Song)
  2. Title To Be Determined / by yanagi (New Song)
  3. Title To Be Determined / by Tennen, SuzukiP (New Song)
  4. Title To Be Determined / by Re:nG (New Song)
  5. Kurenai no Hana/ by F.Koshiba /WandererP
  6. Sweet’s Beast / by Menday-P
  7. Judgement of Corruption / by mothy_akunoP
  8. Shabon no Salamander / by bucchigiriP
  9. Nibiiro Sora ni Hanafubuki / by ShigotoshiteP
  10. Shineba Ii no ni / by dBu Usagi
  11. Tsukeru yo / by SuketchP
  12. BLOOD / by SCL Project(natsuP)
  13. Gokuraku Nostalgic / by MazoP
  14. The Dream I Saw Yesterday / by Agoaniki
  15. Old Radio / by Ulala, ぴーひゃらP
  16. Koi Suru Apuri / by hal
  17. Rosary Pale / by ShinjouP
  18. BONUS TRACK Title To Be Determined / by Naoto Fuuga

Pre-order Bonuses

Lots of stores have pre-order bonuses if you order from them. With all the options, there’s quite the decision in KAITO fans’ hands! Though, there’s one bonus that everyone will get.

Phone Straps

All orders of the CD come with one of five different rubber straps featuring illustrations by うむ (Um), 秋吉 (akiyoshi), のん (Non), Harumaki, and Yuuki.

The phone straps feature KAITO in a variety of different outfits and poses, each one unique and adorable. No matter which strap you get, you’re sure to love it!

These phone straps are all rubber and appear to use a small chord to attach to your phone. If you don’t have a phone or phone case that lets you use this type of hanging, don’t worry! You can find headphone/earphone jack accessories in many stores. Simply switch out the accessory you bought for your KAITO strap!

In addition to the phone strap, there are other unique pre-order bonuses that come from different stores both online and offline.

 

 

Store Specific Bonuses/Where to Buy

Many stores only have special pre-order bonuses available while others only have the phone straps. As mentioned before, every pre-order comes with a strap, so that’s not listed. Only the special items exclusive to the certain store are as listed below. Please note that all stores may not ship internationally.

 

CDJapan
Price: ¥2500 JPY ($24.71 USD)

Animate
Price: ¥2700 JPY (about $27.00 USD)
Bonus: Acrylic keychain illustrated by Non

Animega Bunkyoutou
Price: ¥2700 JPY (about $27.00 USD)
Bonus: Clear file illustrated by Yuu

Amazon Japan
Price: ¥2700 JPY (about $27.00 USD)
Bonus: Sticker set featuring the phone strap illustrations

Tsutaya Records (in-store bonus)
Price: ¥2700 JPY (About $27.00 USD)
Bonus: B2-sized poster illustrated by Yuu

Tsutaya Online
Price: ¥2700 JPY (About $27.00 USD)
Bonus: Original digital wallpaper illustrated by Yuu

Toranoana
Price: ¥2700 JPY (About $27.00 USD)
Bonus: B2-sized calendar illustrated by Yuu

Special 10th Anniversary Edition

There’s also a special 10th anniversary edition available! This special edition not only comes with one of the straps mentioned above but also tons of special, exclusive items. It’s priced at ¥ 3980 JPY and is purchasable through Pony Canyon here. Unfortunately, it’s only available in Japan, so international buyers will need to use a proxy.

This special edition comes with the following bonuses, numbered in the image shown.

  1. One of five phone straps (random)
  2. KAITO illustration book featuring the artists who illustrated the phone straps
  3. Set of three 3.3 cm KAITO metal can badges illustrated by Haruyuki
  4. Set of three postcards illustrated by Yuu

Yuu’s Illustrations

If you like Yuu’s illustrations, feel free to check them out on pixiv! All three of the illustrations are available in high quality for pixiv members to view under the submission titled “Kaitonation”.

The post “Exit Tunes Presents Kaitonation” Set for December Release! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “IA PARTY A GO-GO” Concert Screening and Lia Live at AFA in Indonesia with VNN in Attendance!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
On September 16th-18th, VNN will be attending AFA at Jakarta International Expo in Indonesia. Here, a live screening of “IA PARTY A GO-GO” and Lia performing live at “I ♥ ANISONG” will be held. IA First Live Concert in JAPAN : PARTY A GO-GO Concert Screening                     …

The post “IA PARTY A GO-GO” Concert Screening and Lia Live at AFA in Indonesia with VNN in Attendance! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
On September 16th-18th, VNN will be attending AFA at Jakarta International Expo in Indonesia. Here, a live screening of “IA PARTY A GO-GO” and Lia performing live at “I  ANISONG” will be held.

IA First Live Concert in JAPAN : PARTY A GO-GO Concert Screening

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Time & Location: Sunday, September 18th at Maine Stage (2:10 PM – 3:00 PM)

I  ANISONG with Lia

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Time & Location: Saturday, September 17th at Jakarta International Expo Hall C3 (7 PM and doors open at 6 PM).

There will also be an autograph session for Lia on Saturday at 3 PM for VIP ticket holders through a ballot. For more information, click here.

Lastly, 1st PLACE will have a booth (A07) as well as Exit Tunes (A39).

Our staff from VNN Indonesian, Kuroi and Aria, will be in attendance at this event in order to bring you full coverage!

Check out IA and Lia live convert in Hong Kong on the 16th here.

AFAID Official Website

AFA Facebook Page

IA World Page Facebook

The post “IA PARTY A GO-GO” Concert Screening and Lia Live at AFA in Indonesia with VNN in Attendance! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Album From EXIT TUNES “Vocalocreation” Set to Release September 21st!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
EXIT TUNES announced their latest VOCALOID compilation album titled Vocalocreation feat. Hatsune Miku. It consists of 16 tracks from several famous producers, featuring vocals from various VOCALOIDs like: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin/Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, IA, GUMI, Kamui Gackpo, & MAYU. The cover features illustrations from artists such as “Nidy2D”. The album is set …

The post New Album From EXIT TUNES “Vocalocreation” Set to Release September 21st! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
EXIT TUNES announced their latest VOCALOID compilation album titled Vocalocreation feat. Hatsune Miku. It consists of 16 tracks from several famous producers, featuring vocals from various VOCALOIDs like: Hatsune Miku, Kagamine Rin/Len, Megurine Luka, KAITO, MEIKO, IA, GUMI, Kamui Gackpo, & MAYU. The cover features illustrations from artists such as “Nidy2D”. The album is set to release on September 21st.

Cross-fade Video

EXIT TUNES has released the Part.1 cross-fade video of the album. Check out the video below:

Album Track List

01. Blessed Messiah and The Tower of AI feat. VOCALOID 10 (by HitoshizukuP x Yama△) NEW!!
02. Poetry of Hated Person feat.GUMI (by 164) NEW!!

Sale Price

The album costs ¥2,808 JPY (about $28 USD), including tax. However, overseas customers can purchase it without tax from CDJapan for ¥2,600 JPY (about $26.95 USD).

Pre-order Bonuses

Pre-ordering from CDJapan will earn you the following bonuses:

  • Acrylic Keychain, illustrated by tama (randomly picked, 1 out of 10 characters)
  • Can Badge, illustrated by Nidy2D (randomly picked, 1 out of 10 characters)
  • B2 Poster (First Press bonus)

Pre-order from CDJapan

Amazon Japan orders are open to the international audience. Pre-ordering from Amazon will earn you the following bonuses:

  • Acrylic Keychain, illustrated by tama (randomly picked, 1 out of 10 characters)
  • Can Badge, illustrated by Nidy2D (randomly picked, 1 out of 10 characters)
  • Sticker Set, illustrated by tama

Pre-order from Amazon

Animate only ships within Japan. Pre-ordering from Animate will earn you the following bonuses:

  • Card Sticker, illustrated by Nidy2D
  • Desktop & Smartphone Wallpaper, illustrated by Nidy2D
  • Can Badge, illustrated by tama (randomly picked, 1 out of 10 characters)

Pre-order from Animate

Animega only ships within Japan. Pre-ordering from Animega will earn you the following bonuses: Clear File A4, illustrated by Nidy2D

Pre-order from Animega

Toranoana only ships within Japan, but does work with a forwarding company to ship outside of Japan. Pre-ordering from Toranoana will earn you the following bonuses: Another Jacket for Vocalocreation, however, details of the illustration are yet to be revealed.

Pre-order from Toranoana

More Information

More information about the album can be found on Vocalocreation’s official website.
